Title: Image Enhancer
HomeWiki:
Image Enhancer®   

                                       Front interface for Image Enhancer 1.0.0 Release Candidate 

About

Image Enhancer is a desktop application based on Image Processing concepts. A set of total 64 basic and complex Image Processing filters are implemented here. Moreover snapshots can be captured using video surveillance camera/webcam attached with the computer.

It enables the end users to modify their pictures in several ways by offering numerous filters and effects through a rich GUI which can be utilized in multiple ways, as per the requirements of the end users. This software was developed using Microsoft Dot Net Framework 4.0 and Visual C#. Currently running version is 1.0. This project uses AForge.NET Framework (http://www.aforgenet.com/) for computer vision and image processing. 

 Main Features

  1. A sum total of 64 simple and complex image processing filters are incorporated with full parameter customization. More stunning filters to be added soon.
  2. Supports JPG , JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF, TIF, EMF, EXIF, GIF, WMF and DCM formats in Release Candidate version. More imaging formats to be included in the upcoming versions.
  3. Video Buffering is possible with the use of any USB or Surveillance Camera.
  4. Snapshots of the video can be taken from Video Buffering.

 Download(Beta and Release Candidate)

This source code may be of good use to researchers/developers who are trying to establish an image processing workflow.  International Recognition

I have participated in the Open Source Software(OSS) World Challenge 2014 organized by National IT Promotion Agency, Ministry of Science, ICT and Future Planning, Government of South Korea. This event took place in Seoul.

Image Enhancer was recognized for it's good impact and sincere contribution to the open source community.

 Cite Image Enhancer

If you are reusing this code/software for further development/other purposes or using this software for R&D/ your own publication/research, you are requested to cite Image Enhancer repository in your related publication/technical report/thesis.  

While citing, write the DOI of Image Enhancer 1.0 RC to the 'References' section of your publication, given below.  

 Hazra, A 2014. Image Enhancer: A Graphic Editor to Apply Numerous Effects in Digital Image. Journal of Open Research Software 2(1):e31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5334/jors.bm

Futuristic Approach

At the present moment I am trying to enhance this software to include some more filters along with added functionality which are not present in AForge.NET framework. Apart from that, giving support to more imaging formats is another burning issue which needs to taken care of. For this reason this project may change rapidly. Almost all the parameters of the image processing filters are customized in RC version at present.  Please keep visit the  Image Enhancer Page for continuous updates.

 Contact Me

The support mechanism for Image Enhancer is through developer e-mail and discussion threads of this website. If you want to know more about this project / contribute to this project with me or seek any support for Image Enhancer, please contact me in my mail abhisek.hazra[AT]hotmail[DOT]com. Contact me here also for licensing issues and reusing the software or code. The Discussion Thread is also open for your positive response, experiences and important feedback.

I will be more than glad to receive your valuable feedback and constructive opinions.
